Learners, welcome! You will find below the presentations for the _"Workshop: How to describe biological data? A primer to a FAIR approach for now and the future"_, here shortened to [Workshop Biometadata-01](https://biometadata-01.sciencesconf.org/). Source code for the presentations are available on the [Workshop Gitlab](https://git.rwth-aachen.de/clavellab/workshop-biometadata-01).

Make use of the **search bar** on the top right of the website to look up terms within all presentations or use the categories to filter the type of presentations.

Unsure about the definition of an acronym used in the workshop? Have a look at the [table of acronyms and abbreviations](acronyms.qmd).
